name: Critical War Sniper
description:
This action shooter has a variety of challenging missions and a variety of interesting features. These features make this action shooting game quite unique, fun and addictive. In this war, your duty is to fight, shoot, kill, complete the mission. In this war game, prove your shooting skills, fight against the enemy. Accept the mission, now download this exciting action shooting game.

Features:
- Smart AI
- American Soldier
- HD 3D graphics
- Play anytime, anywhere
- Simple and smooth operation
- Best quality attractive sound effects
- Radar vision positioning the enemy's position
- Challenges of increasing levels of difficulty
- Realistic 3D shooting battlefield environment
- A large number of advanced powerful weapons warfare equipment
